name: LifeOfLoader
description:
Life of Loader it’s simulator, story telling game. Where you have to managing all market stuff, quick displaying and quick unloading trucks for market, using your memory and place managing skills. Some times there is too many trucks, some times too few. After work you get paid, how much, depending on how good you make your job.
In the end final stocktaking, where you will find answer will you continue working in this market or not.
